thread.title: Rep. Cedric Richmond’s sexist couch gag about Kellyanne Conway isn’t going down smoothly
thread.title_full: Rep. Cedric Richmond’s sexist couch gag about Kellyanne Conway isn’t going down smoothly

author: Brett T.
title: Rep. Cedric Richmond’s sexist couch gag about Kellyanne Conway isn’t going down smoothly
text:
Rep. Cedric Richmond's sexist couch gag about Kellyanne Conway isn't going down smoothly 
It doesn’t look as though either version struck the public’s funny bone. @bennyjohnson @CedricRichmond @KellyannePolls what a sickening thing to say. It's should never be alright to smear a woman in this fashion. 
— Alli Macken (@allimacken) March 2, 2017 Stage 2 of the The 4 stages of Conservative Female Abuse: https://t.co/QwZ3kSlunP https://t.co/M0bnY3uLUH 
— Michelle Malkin (@michellemalkin) March 2, 2017 @bennyjohnson @The_Real_Fly @CedricRichmond really? take politics off the table and just have some respect for women 
— Steph Wilkinson (@ephie123) March 2, 2017 @bennyjohnson @CedricRichmond Mysogynistic much? @KellyannePolls is an advisor to the president, a mom of 4 & an accomplished woman. Vile. 
— Alli Macken (@allimacken) March 2, 2017 @bennyjohnson @CedricRichmond @KellyannePolls is this them going high again? If so, I'd hate to see what their going low would look like.
